description:
Combining the power of runes created this ethereal 
armor. 20% evasion and 10% magic resistance
name: Shadow Armor
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Leather: 4
Soul Essence
Onyx: 2
Shadow Rune: 4
Protection Rune: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Custom Synthesis Effect>
var vId = 18;
var add = 300;
$gameVariables.setValue(vId, $gameVariables.value(vId) + add);
</Custom Synthesis Effect>
